name: Space Ninja (MartineitorDev)
description:
Before we start, this is my first game, so please don't criticize it for having bad graphics or gameplay, unless it's with respect, thanks c:

Defeat the aliens

Shoot the aliens

A classic game of shooting aliens that in this case are ninja stars

If you kill multiple enemies, you will unlock a boss and you can win the game ;)

The controls are in the game and this one is for pc.

you don't have to install anything, just play it in your browser :D

PS: if you press "r" you will restart the game
